terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Terms & Conditions
terms.readCarefully: Please read these terms carefully before using our service.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Syndik ("we," "our," or "us"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Syndik is a comprehensive SaaS platform designed for residential syndicate management, providing:

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times.
responsibilities: Maintain the security of your password
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
Do not share your account credentials

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.content: You may use our service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.
prohibited: Violate any applicable federal, state, local, or international law
Transmit any material that is defamatory, offensive, or otherwise objectionable
Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to other accounts

payment.title: 5. Payment and Billing
payment.content: Some services may require payment. Payment terms will be clearly displayed before you make any purchase.
details: All fees are non-refundable except as required by law
You authorize us to charge your payment method
Subscription fees are billed in advance
Price changes will be communicated 30 days in advance

privacy.title: 6. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our service.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Syndik and its licensors.

limitationLiability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: In no event shall Syndik, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.
limitationLiability.additionalContent: Our total liability to you for any claim arising from these terms or your use of the service shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the twelve months preceding the claim.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

modifications.title: 10. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice.

governingLaw.title: 11. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which Syndik operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
contact.address: Syndik Legal Department, 123 Business Street, City, Country

effectiveDate.title: Effective Date:
effectiveDate.content: These terms are effective as of January 1, 2025. By continuing to use Syndik after this date, you agree to be bound by these terms.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account, syndicate, and application preferences.
settings.personalInformationDescription: Update your personal details and contact information.
settings.clerkSecurityNote: Email and phone number changes are managed through Clerk for enhanced security and verification.
settings.clerkEmailNote: Email changes must be made through your Clerk account settings for security reasons.
settings.clerkPhoneNote: Phone number changes must be made through your Clerk account settings with SMS verification.
